instructions: From any home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu > Settings . Tap Delete old messages . Slide the switch to the ON position. Tap Text message limit. Set a limit. Tap OK . Tap Multimedia message limit. Set a limit. Tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under APPLICATIONS , tap Application manager . Tap the application to uninstall. Tap Uninstall. Tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Gmail . Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Settings . Tap your email address . Tap Days of mail to sync . Select 3 , then tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEMS , tap Storage . Under DEVICE MEMORY , view the Available space value
